detail_desc: Triangle bikini top with lined cups, laser-cut, scalloped edges and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can also be fastened across the back. Wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Triangle bikini top with lined cups, laser-cut, scalloped edges and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can also be fastened across the back. Wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Triangle bikini top with lined cups, laser-cut, scalloped edges and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can also be fastened across the back. Wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft embroidered knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit with triangle cups, removable inserts and ties at the top. Seam at the waist, a low-cut back and laser-cut scalloped trims.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit with triangle cups, removable inserts and ties at the top. Seam at the waist, a low-cut back and laser-cut scalloped trims.

Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, elasticated waist and high cut at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Long dolman sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Ballet pumps in patterned canvas with a glittery, appliquéd elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, padded velour jacket with a high stand-up collar and zip down the front. Beaded appliqué on one sleeve, welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Soft, wide top with a small stand-up collar that is folded in, and dropped shoulders.
Soft, wide top with a small stand-up collar that is folded in, and dropped shoulders.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
Top in sturdy crêpe jersey with a stand-up collar, long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs and pleats at the waist.
Shopper in sturdy, braided plastic with two imitation leather handles at the top. Size approx. 12x31x39 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in a cupro and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar, classic front and short sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. The shirt is made partly from recycled cupro.

Straight-cut shirt in a cupro and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar, classic front and short sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. The shirt is made partly from recycled cupro.

Straight-cut shirt in a cupro and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar, classic front and short sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. The shirt is made partly from recycled cupro.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a patterned lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One-button fastening at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles at the top and ties with a metal ring at the ends. Size 15x31x37 cm.
Shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles at the top and ties with a metal ring at the ends. Size 15x31x37 cm.
Leather and suede bag with an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One small outer compartment with a zip and two smaller inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 14x20x27 cm.
Leather and suede bag with an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One small outer compartment with a zip and two smaller inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 14x20x27 cm.

Calf-length denim skirt with a paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a tie at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, back pockets, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening, and a slit at the front. Unlined.

Calf-length denim skirt with a paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a tie at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, back pockets, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening, and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Checked twill jacket with notch lapels, buttons down the front and front pockets. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x18x28.5 cm.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x18x28.5 cm.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x18x28.5 cm.

Short kimono jacket in soft, patterned denim with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and no buttons. The width of the sleeves can be adjusted using the press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jacket in striped satin with trims, a shawl collar and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud fastening. Front pockets and a partially concealed tie belt at the waist. Partly lined.
Wide trousers in a sturdy weave with a sheen. High waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and pleats at the front. Low crotch, side pockets, fake back pockets, and straight legs.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in twill made from a wool blend with pleats at the top, side pockets and fake back pockets. Straight legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in a textured, striped weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip in the side, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Wide trousers in soft twill with pleats and belt loops at the top, a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side and back pockets and wide, tapered legs with a drawstring at the hems.

Wide trousers in soft washed denim with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight-cut legs with creases at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length, flared skirt in woven fabric with buttons at the top, concealed pockets in the side seams and an opening at the hem.
Calf-length, flared skirt in woven fabric with buttons at the top, concealed pockets in the side seams and an opening at the hem.

Balconette swimsuit with a shaping effect. Underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust and a sculpting effect that shapes and holds in the tummy and seat. Cut-out section and a metal fastener at the back. Shoulder straps included.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges, wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem. No fasteners.

Nursing blouse in woven fabric with lace details, pin-tucks at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Double-layered with an inner top for easier nursing access.

Nursing blouse in woven fabric with lace details, pin-tucks at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Double-layered with an inner top for easier nursing access.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a round neckline, and 3/4-length, open sleeves with ties at the cuffs.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Wide elastication at the hem and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck with frill trims that continue over the shoulders and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross over at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with short frilled sleeves, a wrapover front with decorative frills and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Decorative ties at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with short frilled sleeves, a wrapover front with decorative frills and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Decorative ties at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and gathers at the back.

Bikini top in sturdy fabric with lightly padded cups, detachable ties at the back of the neck and a zip at the front. Silicone trim at the back, support below the bust, laser-cut trims at the hem and visible seams.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in sturdy fabric with a high waist, visible seams, laser-cut edges and a half-string back.
Bikini top in sturdy fabric with triangular cups, wide multiway shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the back, laser-cut trims and visible seams.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in sturdy fabric with a low waist, laser-cut edges and high cut at the back.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch flexible denim for maximum mobility. Worn details with partial patches on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and straight-cut hems.
Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
High-waisted leggings in sturdy jersey with corset lacing at the front and wide elastic at the back.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed, superstretch denim with worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.

T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and a smocked hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
